verbose_text: The weight gain and long-term hyperphagia driven by lPBN IL-6 reduction were not detected in two separate cohorts of rats fed two different obesogenic diets (XREF_SUPPLEMENTARY and XREF_SUPPLEMENTARY) as maintenance diets; observation previously reported for IL-6-/- mice.
evidence: gain and long-term hyperphagia driven by lPBN IL-6
